data.text: @_sharaaaaa_ @theseoulstory In that episode they recorded later, but in 2019 they did not attend due to the agenda and there was no pandemic, but this time it is different due to covid, more infected members may come out and what is wanted is not to risk anyone
@theseoulstory Let's hope that in Loona there are no more infected and that they have a good and speedy recovery
@theseoulstory would put the health of the staff at risk and contestants, there are girls who have just come out of covid and are recently recovered 🤔

@theseoulstory Perhaps they could have delayed it if the girls they would have been infected recording, but this was not in this case, there may also be a risk of reinfection since, as is known, some members come out today, tomorrow they may come out more infected and+

@theseoulstory The same thing will happen as with Idle in Queendom 1, the first ep was not, nor can it be delayed since the other groups and soloists already have an agenda, if it is delayed it would harm the other contestants in their agendas
